release.action: Added an examples tab and section to show working examples of how to add independant and plugin dependent contracts. A first example showing the POD plugin & contract has been started.
Cleaning up usage of structurer using the new chunks of FOR-1059. Reducing code duplications.
Cleaning up locationmap from the former xdocs location. See news #cleanup.15.06.07 how to update.
More i18n work by Sjur on Dispatcher. This patch correctly localizes menus & tabs.
Rename to ContractsMessages_en.xml, part of i18n changes by Sjur.

Add ability to get a list of contracts provided by a plugin. For this to work the plugin name must have "plugin" within it, e.g. "org.apache.forrest.plugin.input.doap". Requesting ls.contracts.org.apache.forrest.plugin.input.doap.source.xml will return a source listing of plugins provided by the named plugin. Requesting ls.contracts.org.apache.forrest.plugin.input.doap.[FORMAT] will return a formatted output document listing all templates supplied by the identified plugin.
i18n: Add LocaleAction action wrapper, and use the locale provided by it. Was taking the locale directly from the request instead of using the standard method in Forrest: LocaleAction.

Extending the dispatcher with an internal format. This internal format is our xdoc or xhtml2. The internal format will then be contacted by e.g. html contracts.
